front.title: Segment Routing IPv6 for Mobile User Plane

abstract.t: This document discusses the applicability of SRv6 (Segment Routing IPv6) to user-plane of mobile networks. The source routing capability and the network programming nature of SRv6, accomplish mobile user-plane functions in a simple manner. The statelessness and the ability to control underlying layer will be even more beneficial to the mobile user-plane, in terms of providing flexibility and SLA control for various applications. It also simplifies the network architecture by eliminating the necessity of tunnels, such as GTP-U [TS.29281], PMIP [RFC5213], Mac-in-Mac, MPLS, and so on. In addition, Segment Routing provides an enhanced method for network slicing, which is briefly introduced by this document.
